Posts.Content: emmajane1973 wrote: Hi, i went to my Gp/family doctor on thursday and should have an appointment date through by Tuesday. She said she didnt know for sure what they were. i have 2 clumps/lumps visible when my breast is pulled tight.they are not causing any pain, they seem rough around the edges and are what i would explain as embedded they dont disapear or move around the breast.my right breast is larger,my aunt died of breast cancer aged 54yrs in dec.im hoping I have cysts but would these move freely? also for the last few yrs my white cell count has been over 25000, im to have an ultrsound because i have implants.can someone explain the difference maybe in cysts and a tumour feeling to me please? thankyou xx Log in to post a reply
